jd:
Role name: Project Manager
Role Description: Handling of work as assigned in Project, Working in Agile methodology, work with Customer directly, working with deadlines.
Competencies: Digital : SAP Advanced Business Application Programming (ABAP) for HANA, Digital : SAP Concur
Experience (Years): 8-10
Essential Skills: 2 years experience with software implementations preferably within the online travel environment
Experience in client facing role
Functional consulting experience preferred
1 year+ experience with Concur Solutions preferred
Experience with software as a service (hosted) a plus
Experience with financial applications or knowledge of accounting practices a plus
Desirable Skills: Must have at least 1 implementation experience as a consultant. Candidate must demonstrate through past project experiences solid knowledge gained in the specific areas indicated. Good Verbal & Written Communication Skills Ability to analyze problems and provide clear recommendations. Good interpersonal skills? Must be an effective problem solver. Strong organizational skills.
